descriptions: I'm running a personal technical blog that shares all my experieces, knowledges and skillsets. This project is hosted by using AWS technology (S3, Route53, CloudFront and Certificate Manager).

The main purpose of starting this blog is to at least record down the obstacles, common mistake I've made in the past so that next time I can straight away make a quick response when facing the same problem.
I also hope this blog able to help the developer by providing them some technical guideline and solutions on how to tackle the problem.
